string.text:
A decent set of tools containing small pliers, tipped tweezers and a probe and pick set. With enough knowledge and experience, this kit can be used for the creation of better equipment.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] usable on mechanic's workshop for crafting
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] a technician could use this to fully modify weapons and armor
 %c[pda_white] • %c[ui_red] requires suitable materials

A basic repair toolkit, unlikely to be suitable for advanced maintenance. Contains different types and sizes of pliers, screws, adhesives and assorted fasteners. With enough knowledge and experience, this kit can be used for the creation of better equipment.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] usable on mechanic's workshop for crafting
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] a technician could use this to fully modify weapons and armor
 %c[pda_white] • %c[ui_red] requires suitable materials

A small case of plastic packages, tablets and ampoules used for managing and producing drugs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] usable on mechanic's workshop for crafting
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] a medic could use this in making drugs and medicine
 %c[pda_white] • %c[ui_red] requires suitable materials

A professional set of high quality tools for fine-tuning equipment. Contains a drill bit set, precision tweezers, soldiering iron, 4mm screwdriver bits and a multimeter. With enough knowledge and experience, this kit can be used for the creation of advanced equipment.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] usable on mechanic's workshop for crafting
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] a technician could use this to fully modify weapons and armor
 %c[pda_white] • %c[ui_red] requires suitable materials

A decent set of gunsmithing tools and accessories, containing a pin punch set, wheeler hammer, press tool and a black powder measure kit. With enough knowledge and experience, this kit can be used for recycling damaged ammunition and the creation of better variants.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] usable on mechanic's workshop for crafting
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] a technician could use this to fully modify weapons and armor
 %c[pda_white] • %c[ui_red] requires suitable materials

Standard Ukrainian-issue military binoculars. Useful for reconnaissance and very durable.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] equip into binoculars slot
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] equipped with zoom functionality

A nylon travel case with a beard and moustache comb and facial scissors, ultra-sharp blades of stainless steel and a precision trimming tip.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Disassembling Tool

A small pack containing a handful of bolts and empty rounds used as a cheap alternative for anomaly navigation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Contains 20-30 Bolts and/or Empty Rounds

The universal and elegant Swiss knife. It can be utilized as a supportive material in both weapon and outfit repairs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Disassembling Tool

The LLMC is a simple metal box with thick walls and foam inserts as well as a heavy, pressure-sealing lid. Specifically designed for transporting artefacts within the Zone. Stops all radiation, thus ensuring user safety when in possession of artefacts. However, the device cannot be attached to the belt, stopping any positive or negative properties from being applied.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[pda_white] artefact storage device
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Capacity: %c[ui_gray_2]1
 
 %c[ui_red]WARNING: %c[ui_gray_2]You must remove artefacts from the container prior to selling them.

The LLMC is a simple metal box with thick walls and foam inserts as well as a heavy, pressure-sealing lid. Specifically designed for transporting artefacts within the Zone. Stops all radiation, thus ensuring user safety when in possession of artefacts. However, the device cannot be attached to the belt, stopping any positive or negative properties from being applied.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[pda_white] artefact storage device
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Capacity: %c[ui_gray_2]1
 
 %c[ui_red]WARNING: %c[ui_gray_2]You must remove artefacts from the container prior to selling them.

The LLMC is a simple metal box with thick walls and foam inserts as well as a heavy, pressure-sealing lid. Specifically designed for transporting artefacts within the Zone. Stops all radiation, thus ensuring user safety when in possession of artefacts. However, the device cannot be attached to the belt, stopping any positive or negative properties from being applied.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[pda_white] artefact storage device
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Capacity: %c[ui_gray_2]1
 
 %c[ui_red]WARNING: %c[ui_gray_2]You must remove artefacts from the container prior to selling them.

Holds a sleeping bag.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Pick Up Sleeping Bag
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]Use while near Sleeping Bag

A light sleeping bag for staying warm and dry when needing to rest away from a bed.
 
 %c[ui_red]WARNING: %c[ui_gray_2]Sleeping in the open may attract predators.
 Does not protect from radiation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Place Sleeping Bag, Sleep
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]Use Sleeping Bag Sack to pick up

A bag, intended for the storage and transportation of a camping tent. Disassembly and packing takes time.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Pick Up Tent
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]Use while near Tent

A bag containing a tent for camping, allowing shelter from rain and wind. Assembly and installation take time.
 
 %c[ui_red]WARNING: %c[ui_gray_2]Sleeping in the open may attract predators.
 Does not protect from radiation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Place Tent, Sleep
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]Use Camping Tent Bag (Empty) to pick up
A large printed map with some marked locations and hand-written sheets of paper. Apparently the owner was an artefact hunter.\n \n

Every stalker is aware of the importance of reliable weaponry. That's the reason a daily and thorough examination of your shooter is vital to your survival. Stalkers often count their ammo and clean it to minimize the risk of a weapon jam in the heat of battle.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A kit containing oils and tools used for basic firearm maintenance. Useful when out exploring, but also quite heavy.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] drag onto the item you wish to repair

A makeshift kit of sewing equipment and spare materials for outfit maintenance. Useful for repairing holes and tears in armor.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] drag onto the item you wish to repair

A scrap of paper containing your equipment condition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] usable for equipment condition assessment

The best tool for opening locks and unhinging doors.
 There's rumors of a famous stalker who used a crowbar as a weapon with the inscription "Property of Black Mesa" written upon it.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] unlimited usages

A bulky, durable and powerful lamp running on lithium-ion batteries.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A reliable, water-proof source of fire is essential in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] usable for cooking, smoking and lighting a fire

There is almost no point in carrying a lighter if you can't use it. Experienced stalkers always remember to fill their lighters with fuel before departing on longer excursions deep into the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] usable for fueling lighters

Small cases of plastic bags containing pills and herbs used for managing and producing drugs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[ui_red] • %c[pda_white] unusable
